sentence.Network_en: Effects of abscisic acid ( ABA ) treatment on onion ( Allium cepa ) dormancy were studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了不同浓度外源脱落酸 ( ABA ) 对洋葱 鳞茎 休眠的影响.

sentence.Network_en: Eastern Asian plant; larger than Allium _ schoenoprasum.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种东亚的草本植物(韭菜葱属),叶扁平、开有白色小花、细长球茎上裹有纤维状表皮; 比细香葱大.

sentence.Network_en: The present paper reports the chromosome numbers and karyotypes of 9 populations of Allium przewalskianum ( Liliaceae ).
sentence.Network_cn: 本文研究了青海葱属青甘 韭 9个居群的染色体数目和核型.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 葱属（allium）(Allium)旧属百合科(Liliaceae)，通称葱蒜类。具有大约1250种；植物学分类将这类植物独立成葱科(Alliaceae)。

means.word_mean: 1. large genus of perennial and biennial pungent bulbous plants: garlic; leek; onion; chive; sometimes placed in family Alliaceae as the type genus
